title: CAR MODEL overview page
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see a list of all CAR MODELS\
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist\
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* There is a dedicated page (with a dedicated URL) where all CAR MODELS are presented.
* A warning message is shown when there are no CAR MODELS.
* The overview page always returns with status code \`200\`, no matter if any CAR MODEL exists or not.
* By default, the CAR MODELS are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* The sorting is always case-insensitive.
* Each CAR MODEL is presented with a thumbnail image, its primary information and a link to its detail page.
* The overview displays at most 100 CAR MODELS at once.
* When there are more than 100 CAR MODELS then the “pagination” feature is activated.
* Pagination allows the user to scroll through all CAR MODELS - 100 items at a time.
* The user is able to bookmark and revisit any paginated CAR MODEL page.
